AboutUs.contact.us.title: We look forward to your email!
AboutUs.section1.text: We believe real estate management and ownership should be simple, enjoyable and that great results can be achieved from anywhere on the planet.
AboutUs.section1.title: Our Vision
AboutUs.section2.text: We focus on innovation for real estate management by developing leading edge software, creating intuitive design, leveraging intelligent technologies and integrating important workflows and partners.
AboutUs.section2.title: What we do
AboutUs.section3.text: With us you have a partner on your side that brings global experieces to the table. We have worked and lived in many places around the world, including the Silicon Valley, where we have been part in building successful companies. We gained experiences by working together with "Fortune 500" companies, but also with SMBs, in which we have introduced innovative products and business models to the market.
AboutUs.section3.title: The Team
App.cookie.policy: This website uses cookies. If you are browsing on this website, you agree to the use of cookies.
App.meta.description: Digital property and facility management from anywhere. Collaborate in real-time, access data anytime. For real estate professionals, owners, landlords, property managers and facility managers.
App.meta.about.us.description: Learn more about the EverReal vision, the team and how we are driving innovation for the real estate industry.

Homepage.Newsletter.popup.title: We are very happy about your interest!
Homepage.Newsletter.title: You own or manage real-estate? Great! Then sign up here to get early access.
Homepage.section1.title: Finally! Manage real estate from anywhere. Collaborate in real-time. Access data anytime.
Homepage.section2.title: One-click access to contracts, documents and other data related to your real-estate.
Homepage.section3.title: Track the status of all the activities around your properties such as repairs, maintenance schedules and much more.
Homepage.section4.title: Simple assignment and completion of tasks with employees and service providers.
